segments.text: Every so often . It is very convenient and the price is lower than in stores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Books , cosmetics , daily necessities , even large electrical appliance can be ordered from online-stores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Incredible . I really want to survey the on-line virtual supermarket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even you can bargain with the owner of one on-line store , although he or she provides ' But It Now ' prices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the disadvantages of on-line shopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some provide wrong pictures for the goods , so many buyers are deceived .
segments.speaker: S2
